tutoring_services.overview: The Morgan State University Computer Science Department offers comprehensive tutoring services to support student success in programming and computer science courses.

services.description: No appointment necessary. First-come, first-served basis.
One-on-one or small group sessions by appointment.
services.booking: Schedule through Ms. Williams or online portal

services.description: Organized study sessions for specific courses.
services.schedule: Weekly before exams and project deadlines

services.description: Assistance with lab assignments and programming projects.
services.location: Computer Labs A, B, and C
services.available: During lab hours and tutoring center hours

peer_tutors.description: Advanced undergraduate students who have excelled in CS courses
qualifications: Completed target course with A or B+

programming_help_forum.response_time: Typically within 2-4 hours during business days

cs1_bootcamp.description: Intensive support for students in Programming I

coding_interview_prep.target_audience: Juniors and seniors preparing for internships/jobs

policies.cost: Free for all Morgan State CS students
policies.session_limit: No limit on drop-in sessions, scheduled sessions limited to 2 hours per week
policies.missed_appointments: Must cancel scheduled sessions 2 hours in advance
policies.academic_integrity: Tutors provide guidance and explanation, not complete solutions

feedback.evaluation: Students encouraged to provide feedback through online surveys
feedback.improvements: Based on student input and course performance data
